sections.heading: A Weekend for Bitcoiners in the Countryside of Japan
sections.content: Join us for the inaugural Bush Bash Japan, inspired by Bush Bash Australia. This informal weekend brings Bitcoiners together in the Japanese countryside‚Äîno event cost, no KYC, just great discussions and experiences. As more participants confirm their attendance, the schedule and activities will be updated.

items.activity: Sauna, Bonfire, Dinner, Drinks, and More
Activities and discussions based on attendee interest

sections.heading: üìç Location
sections.content: Bush Bash Japan will take place at Lodge Kiyokawa in Bungo-≈åno, Oita, Japan. The lodge is surrounded by stunning nature, offering a great setting for outdoor discussions and relaxation.

sections.heading: üè° Accommodations
sections.content: Attendees can stay at Lodge Kiyokawa, which offers both private and shared rooms. Additional nearby lodging options will be provided as needed. Please book early to secure your spot!

sections.heading: üõèÔ∏è Current Availability
sections.content:
The following options are available accommodations:
6 Tree Houses (each for 2 people)
16 Dormitory Spots (8 male, 8 female). If you‚Äôd like to make a reservation, please use the contact form below.

sections.heading: üçΩÔ∏è Food Availability
sections.content: Food will be available for purchase at Lodge Kiyokawa. There are also a few nearby restaurants and a Michi no Eki.
